about_the_game:
Welcome to Bloobs Adventure Idle Demo !

Embark on a nostalgic journey in this fully idle game!

🚀 Immerse yourself in a 2D top-down world filled with endless possibilities.

⚔️ Engage in Epic Battles: Conquer foes and level up your combat skills as you progress through the game.

🌍 Explore Vast Lands: Uncover hidden treasures and secrets as you navigate through the expansive world of Bloobs.

🌳 Master Gathering Skills: Gather resources to craft powerful items and enhance your character's abilities.

🛠️ Become an Artisan: Hone your artisan skills to create unique and valuable items that will set you apart on your adventure.

📈 Full Leveling System: Watch your character evolve and grow stronger with a comprehensive leveling system.

Are you ready to experience the ultimate idle adventure?

Level up Each Skill to the max of Level 20 , Explore , fill your bank with loot , prepare your Bloob for your adventure !!!
